column4: i've installed my fglrx ati driver, but, why does my OpenGL is still mesa?
do ALT+F2 and type in the commandbox: gedit /var/log/Xorg.0.log
you don't seem to have configured Xorg to use the fglrx driver.. what install instructions did you use?
did you do: sudo aticonfig --initial        after installation?
can you ALT+F2 and type: gedit /etc/X11/xorg.conf          I think that one line is wrong there..
you might want my lspci rite?
what graphics card do you have? a newer ati graphics card ?
if you wanted to see my lspci here it is http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/26334/
that one is fully supported by fglrx.. but one line is wrong in xorg.conf .. thats strange..
you could do it automatically or change it manually.. try it automatically and tell me what the output of the command is..
